title: CVD pro / Market Power
content:
This indicator allows you to build and display the cumulative delta of a session based on transactions of the selected filters. To optimize the server load, indicator data is displayed only for the current session.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Settings

NameDescription
SMA Period Specifies the quantity of recent candles to include in the calculations.
Cumulative Trades A mode in which only cumulative transactions are used in calculations.
Minimum volume Volumes that are less than the value set in this filter will be ignored.
Maximum volume Volumes greater than the value set in this filter will be ignored.

Visualization

NameDescription
Show SMA Determines whether to display an element that represents a moving average.
Show High/Low Determines whether to display the element that represents the high/low line.
Show cumulative Shows a vertical column on each bar
High Low Color Defines the color to display the high/low line.
Color Specifies the color to display the cumulative delta line.
SMA Color Defines the color to display the SMA line.
Width Defines the line width for displaying the high/low line.

Misc

NameDescription
Show description The parameter controls the visibility of the indicator's name and its parameters on the chart, enabling the display of this information to be toggled on or off.

Drawing

NameDescription
Panel Determines the display location of the indicator: it can either integrate within the main chart area or appear on a separate panel below the chart.
